Question: ZERC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Razer

ZERC CES 2024

- Razer Sensa HD Haptics with Project Esther
- Razer Blade 16 with OLED 240Hz 16” Display, Intel® Core™ i9-14900HX processor, and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4090 graphics
- Razer Blade 14 with AMD Ryzen™ 9 8945HS processor, NVIDIA® GeForce™ RTX 4070 Laptop Graphics, and QHD+ 240 Hz display
- Razer Blade 18 with 4K 165Hz 18” display and Thunderbolt™5 connectivity
- Razer USB C Dock with 11-port connectivity
- Razer Iskur V2 Gaming Chair with 6D Adjustable and Adaptive Lumbar Support System
- Razer Aether Monitor Light Bar with dual lighting, Razer Chroma™ RGB, and smart home connectivity
- Sustainability achievements including recycled materials and Environmental Product Declaration certification
- New updates for Razer Axon, Synapse, and the Chroma App
Summary_cn:
雷蛇

ZERC CES 2024

- Razer Sensa HD触觉技术与Project Esther
- Razer Blade 16采用OLED 240Hz 16英寸显示屏，搭载Intel® Core™ i9-14900HX处理器和NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4090显卡
- Razer Blade 14采用AMD Ryzen™ 9 8945HS处理器，搭载NVIDIA® GeForce™ RTX 4070笔记本显卡，享有QHD+ 240Hz显示屏
- Razer Blade 18采用4K 165Hz 18英寸显示屏并支持Thunderbolt™ 5连接
- Razer USB C Dock支持11个端口连接
- Razer Iskur V2 游戏椅具备6D可调节和适应性腰部支持系统
- Razer Aether Monitor Light Bar具备双重照明、Razer Chroma™ RGB以及智能家居连接功能
- 环保成就，包括可回收材料和环境产品声明认证
- Razer Axon、Synapse和Chroma App的新更新内容
